generator:
{ topicOf(P, T) : topic(T) } = 1 :- presentation(P).
{ scheduled(P, R, S, D) : room(R), slot(S), day(D) } = 1 :- presentation(P).

hard_constraints.description: Sanity check for room double-booking; one talk at a time.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(P1, R, S, D), scheduled(P2, R, S, D), P1 != P2.

hard_constraints.description: Don't overwork the rooms; 3 sessions max per day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- room(R), day(D), #count { S : scheduled(_, R, S, D) } > 3.

hard_constraints.description: Give the rooms a break; no back-to-back sessions in the same room.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(_, R, S, D), scheduled(_, R, S + 1, D).

hard_constraints.description: Room 2 is low-tech, so no AI or Cloud sessions allowed there.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(P, 2, S, D), topicOf(P, T), T = ("AI"; "Cloud").

hard_constraints.description: VR is strictly banned from Room 1.
Keep IoT moving; it needs to be spread across at least 3 different days.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- #count { D : scheduled(P, R, S, D), topicOf(P, "IoT") } < 3.

hard_constraints.description: AI and VR don't play nice; they can't share a room on the same day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(P1, R, S1, D), topicOf(P1, "AI"), scheduled(P2, R, S2, D), topicOf(P2, "VR").

hard_constraints.description: Don't crowd the Cloud and IoT sessions; no more than 2 in the same slot.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- day(D), slot(S), #count { P : scheduled(P, R, S, D), topicOf(P, T), T = ("Cloud"; "IoT") } > 2.

hard_constraints.description: Day 1 bright and early must be an AI session, and nothing else.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
:- #count { P, R : scheduled(P, R, 1, 1), topicOf(P, "AI") } = 0.
:- scheduled(P, R, 1, 1), not topicOf(P, "AI").

hard_constraints.description: Day 4 early afternoon is strictly reserved for VR.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
:- #count { P, R : scheduled(P, R, 3, 4), topicOf(P, "VR") } = 0.
:- scheduled(P, R, 3, 4), not topicOf(P, "VR").

hard_constraints.description: No ghost days; every day needs to host at least one presentation.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- day(D), #count { P : scheduled(P, R, S, D) } = 0.

hard_constraints.description: No topic monopolies; any time slot that's active needs at least two different topics (excluding restricted kick-off/closing slots).
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- day(D), slot(S), (S, D) != (1, 1), (S, D) != (3, 4), #count { P, R : scheduled(P, R, S, D) } > 0, N = #count { T : topicOf(P, T), scheduled(P, R, S, D) }, N < 2.

soft_constraints.description: Priority 1: Let's try to maximize how many rooms are buzzing during each active session.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("rooms_in_use", (D, S), 5 - N) :- day(D), slot(S), N = #count { R : scheduled(_, R, S, D) }.

soft_constraints.description: Priority 2: Try to keep the total number of idle slots to a minimum.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("idle_slot", (R, D, S), 1) :- room(R), day(D), slot(S), not scheduled(_, R, S, D).

global_objective: #minimize { C@2, D, S : penalty("rooms_in_use", (D, S), C); C@1, R, D, S : penalty("idle_slot", (R, D, S), C) }.
